tool_description: Formats API responses with consistent structure, status codes, headers, and content types for web applications.

default_format.description: Default response format: json, xml, csv

include_metadata.description: Include response metadata like timestamps and request IDs

error_messages: Invalid response format: Use one of [json, xml, csv]
